entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
